name: West African Peanut Lentil Soup
description: West African Inspired Peanut Lentil Soup. African Peanut Stew with lentils and veggies., Harissa Spice, peanut butter, Sweet potato. Serves 3 to 4 or more.

video.name: West African Peanut Lentil Soup
video.description:
West African Peanut Stew with Lentils & Veggies
Full Recipe here ➡️ http://www.veganricha.com/2015/12/african-peanut-lentil-soup.html

African Inspired Peanut Stew with red lentils, veggie, Harissa Spice, Peanuts and Sweet potato. 1 Pot. 30 Minutes. 
Instant Pot Option!

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp sambal oelek or asian chili sauce or other hot chile sauce to taste
1/4 cup nut butter like peanut butter or almond butter
2 cups veggies (chopped small or thin slices - zucchini, sweet potato or potato, carrots, eggplant, broccoflower etc)
1 tsp or more lime or lemon juice
1/2 cup packed baby spinach or other baby greens.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and cook until translucent. 5 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and cook until translucent. 5 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, blend the tomatoes, garlic, ginger, chili sauce, tomato paste, spices until pureed. Add to the saucepan. Cook for 5 to 6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, blend the tomatoes, garlic, ginger, chili sauce, tomato paste, spices until pureed. Add to the saucepan. Cook for 5 to 6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add peanut butter, half of the nuts, lentils, veggies, stock, salt and lemon juice. Mix, cover and cook.
recipeInstructions.name: Add peanut butter, half of the nuts, lentils, veggies, stock, salt and lemon juice. Mix, cover and cook.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir at 15 minutes.Taste and adjust salt, heat and check if the veggies are al-dente. Add in the baby spinach. Cook for another 5 minutes or until the veggies and lentils are cooked through. Add more water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir at 15 minutes.Taste and adjust salt, heat and check if the veggies are al-dente. Add in the baby spinach. Cook for another 5 minutes or until the veggies and lentils are cooked through. Add more water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with rest of the peanuts, cilantro, more lemon juice. Serve with flatbread, crackers or as is.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with rest of the peanuts, cilantro, more lemon juice. Serve with flatbread, crackers or as is.
